gsrse.name: Zowie G-SR-SE Rouge
gsrse.description: Fabric surface with printed color, stable control and smooth gliding sensation, seamless edges, uniform high-density fabric base.

gsrsegrey.name: Zowie G-SR-SE Grey
gsrsegrey.description: Moisture-resistant fabric, color printing, smooth gliding sensation, constant control, seamless edges, uniform high-density rubber base, adequate smoothness, unique braking capability.

gtfx.name: Zowie GTF-X
gtfx.description: Low friction, surface, unique combination, plastic mats, fabric, liquid-resistant, low maintenance, stitched edges, 100% flat smooth rubber base.

ninjafxhayate.name: Ninja FX Hayate KOU
ninjafxhayate.description: Higher version of Hien. HAYATE OTSU is enables more stable gliding and more precise pointing. The Up and down motion of the mouse during mouse movement is less than that of HIEN.

ninjafxzero.name: Ninja FX Zero
ninjafxzero.description: A feeling of operation resembles to Qck. However, a sharper operation feeling with a lighter glide than that. Rapidly rising in popularity now.

ninjafxraiden.name: Ninja FX Raiden
ninjafxraiden.description: Fabrics densely knitted with thin thread realize a quick glide that can not be thought of as cloth. And a smooth slide. mouse pad of silky touch.
